ModMetaData.name: Limited Ideo Reform
ModMetaData.author: YAYO
ModMetaData.description:
Original mod by YAYO! This is an update. You can find the original here: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2636928109
# Only works in ideology "Fluid Type". Revised Vanilla's ideology reform, allowing you to change your ideology by choosing from a limited set of options. This limits too much freedom in Vanilla's reform, giving you the fun of randomness like a roguelike game, and leads you to a unique play.
